paper_abstract: The Atlas of UTR Regulatory Activity ( AURA) is a manually curated and comprehensive catalog of human mRNA untranslated regions ( UTRs) and UTR regulatory annotations. Through its intuitive web interface, it provides full access to a wealth of information on UTRs that integrates phylogenetic conservation, RNA sequence and structure data, single nucleotide variation, gene expression and gene functional descriptions from literature and specialized databases. Availability: http:// aura. science. unitn. it
paper_title: AURA: Atlas of UTR Regulatory Activity
